name: SD Gundam Generation: Zanscare Senki
overview: SD Gundam Generation: Zanscare Senki ("SD Gundam Generation: Record of Zanscare War") is a turn-based strategy game for the Super Famicom. It draws its conflicts and characters from the Mobile Suit Victory Gundam series. It is the fifth of six SD Gundam Generation games released for the Sufami Turbo peripheral, which uses smaller carts that are able to communicate with each other when placed in the Sufami Turbo device.996.
